en.rulestable.norulehits.title: No rule hits
en.rulestable.norulehits.enabledrulesbody: None of your connected systems are affected by enabled rules.
en.rulestable.norulehits.anyrulesbody: None of your connected systems are affected by any known rules.
en.rulestable.fetchrules.error: There was an error fetching rules list.
en.summarychart.nohits: Your connected systems have no rule hits.
en.overviewchart.nohits: Your connected systems have no categorized rule hits.
en.rulesdetails.totalriskbody: The likelihood that this will be a problem is {likelihood}. The impact of the problem would be {impact} if it occurred.
en.overview.categorychart.title: Rule hits by category
en.overview.severitychart.title: Rule hits by severity
en.overview.actioncall.title: Get started with Red Hat Insights
en.overview.connectsystems.title: Connect your first systems
en.overview.connectsystems.body:
Connect at least 10 systems to get a better <break></break>
        awareness of issues and optimizations <break></break>
        identified across your infastructure
en.overview.connectsystems.action: Learn how to connect a system to insights
en.overview.remediate.title: Remediate Insights findings with Ansibles
en.overview.remediate.body:
Easily generate an Ansible playbook to <break></break>
        quickly and effectively remediate Insights <break></break> findings
en.overview.remediate.action: Get started with Insights and Ansible Playbooks
en.overview.deploy.title: Deploy Insights at scale
en.overview.deploy.body:
Get more out of Insights with more systems. <break></break>
        Quickly connect systems with <linkansible> Ansible </linkansible> <break></break>
            or <linkpuppet> Puppet </linkpuppet>
en.overview.actioncallnosystems.body:
With predictive analytics, avoid problems and unplanned <break></break>
        downtime in your Red Hat environment. Red Hat Insights is <break></break>
        included with your Red Hat Enterprise Linux subscription
en.topicdetails.nodetails.title: No details for topic
en.topicdetails.nodetails.body: There exist no further details for this topic.
en.topicslist.notopics.title: There was an issue fetching topics
en.topicslist.notopics.body: Either no topics presently exist or there is an issue presenting them.
